item.title: Create your own blog website using Hugo in less than 1 hour for free
item.description: In the technical age, publishing articles online is a great way to express yourself. It can be of any form like tutorial, blogs, reviews, editorials and much more. It is almost defacto to use Medium for blogging now a days. It provides many benefits like : Focus only on content. Formatting is handled by Medium platform SEO (Search Engine Optimization) to promote the article in google search Easy interface to write article in browser itself And many more like support for images, videos and code reference using Gist Then Why should you have your own blog?
